meanings.definition: Unable to be explained or understood.
meanings.sent1: The magic trick was truly inexplainable to the audience.
meanings.sent2: The mystery surrounding the ancient artifact was inexplainable.
meanings.sent3: It was inexplainable how the cat managed to open the locked door.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of the sunset was inexplainable, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The sudden disappearance of the ship was an inexplainable event that puzzled everyone.

meanings.definition: Not able to be clarified or rationalized.
meanings.sent1: The decision to cancel the event seemed inexplainable to the attendees.
meanings.sent2: The professor's inexplainable behavior left the students confused.
meanings.sent3: It was inexplainable why the traffic suddenly stopped on the empty road.
meanings.sent4: The inexplainable actions of the main character kept the audience on edge.
meanings.sent5: The inexplainable disappearance of the key raised suspicions among the group.
